choices: The female warrior defeats the naga
(FruitSellers reserved spot if he ever wants to use it)
1.content:
Welcome to the 'a hypnotic naga' interactive. I had a lot of fun writing up my static stories and wanted to make this an interactive with the help of FruitSeller. To clarify, please read my static stories first in order to have this make just a tad more sense when you read it. Other than that have fun!

Now which ending would you like to go off of?
1.title: Welcome to the beggining

choices: "Prepare the Knights, it is time we raise our own personal army."
"You two, bring as many hunters you can, to me."
"Entertain me you two, entertain your mistress."
11.content:
After the naga was able to hypnotically control her two victims, her plans moved on to the nearby village they hailed from. Slowly within weeks the naga carefully managed to enslave the village huntsman and women. Then the town knights. And in just a few days after that the rest of the small-folk all became hypnotic slaves resulting in the entire village was her new dominion. She took over and ruled it, taking their spoils and letting them idolize and praise her. The two hunters Kyle and Susan became her loyal body guards.

For the last few months she seemed content with ruling a single village. Under the radar of any hunters that might try and rescue the villagers from her spell. But her greed and desire crept in the back of her mind. She turned to her enslaved bodyguards. "My faithful servants, I have grown tired of him rule. I want something new to refresh my interests."

"Use us in whatever way you want to Mistress.", suggested Kyle.

"Perhaps sharing your irresistible rule would satisfy your boredom.", Susan followed up with.

The naga pondered her options, both seemed like either could pave away her boredom for some time....

"Hmm. My servants are both equally lovely to toy with. Maybe suitable to give me an offspring. But then again expanding my influence beyond the village. I could reach across to the next town. Hunters Grave Stone will give me an army of loyal servants. So many fresh and easily swayed victims. Hopelessly enamored by my exotic charms."

The naga stood up with her human half of her body raised up, she turned to her bodyguards and said...
11.title: The naga defeats both warriors

choices: She manages to reason with whoever it is
Her eyesight comes back very quickly.
111.content:
With her command they ordered them to head out to the town of Hunters Grave Stone. Their orders were simple, bring as many back to their mistress. An easy task. The naga grew excited of the idea that soon an entire army of monster hunters would be under her command. She grew a wicked smile on her lips watching her soldiers walk off to collect her more toys to play with. The excitement was briefly cut-off when the need to eat started to rumble over her stomach.

"I hunger my darlings.", she stated to her spellbound followers.

"Shall we prepare someone for you to digest?", Kyle offered.

"No no no. I would never digest my precious playthings, unless I needed to. No first time in a while I need to eat. I feel in such a good mood, I believe I will go hunt for my food myself."

"Mistress. What do we do?"

"You know what to do when I'm away, always keep APPEARANCES.", Kyle and Susan went around town repeating their mistress' last word. A trigger command that would make the villagers act normal in the event she was not monitoring them in case anyone showed up to the village without her being present.

A while had passed, while the hypnotic naga had gone off to hunt. She was a couple miles into the forest where she can be alone to let off some steam. She loved the feeling of waiting for the right time to unleash her hypnotic power on unforeseen prey. Then one minute, a deer caught an eye over the naga. The deer didn't see the hybrid, its gaze was directed on the far left, it must have heard something else. The naga waited a moment she curled up her coils over her human arm and wound up around and twisted it. Instead of a burn from the rubbing it would normally cause for others, her human skin was softer than any normal human. Letting her squeeze out the oils in between her scales in her constricted layers of scales. She rubbed it on her neck and over her face, and the blew the remaining toward the deer, like blowing a kiss.

For a moment nothing. But seconds later the deer stared straight at the naga and went closer. "Good. Come to me so I can look-", vvvvvvwhip!

The naga turned to her left to see she tripped some kind of trap. For a fraction of a second, she saw a pouch hung by a match. After that a force of raw noise and force sent her back. The naga squeezed her eyes tight, they hurt. She felt sharp stinging. She couldn't force her eyelids to open for even a moment. When the noise stopped ringing and the stinging wasn't so terrible, she swore she opened her eyes. But still she didn't see anything. Nothing. The hypnotic naga struggled with the very real fear, her hypnotic eyes were now blind.

"Die monster!", the naga heard next.
111.title: "Prepare the Knights, it is time we raise o...

choices: He was being attack by another monster
1112.content:
"Please don't kill me! I've done no harm to humans I swear!", the naga woman said lying through her teeth.

"Don't play games! You're that naga hypnotist that is a native part of these woods."

This hunter was aware of her, but did he know of her scheme to enslave the hunters? If she could pry the truth out, without forcing him, then this could turn things to her favor. Her face was still covered by both of her hands, the trap had blinded her eyes and she could tell no matter how hard she tried they wouldn't work. Nagas have an above normal level of healing in critical areas of the body. Her eyesight would return, probably in time when her servants returned with the hunters she ordered them to bring back. But for now her attention needed to be centered on this lone one.

"I'm a naga yes, but the hypnotist you speak of is not myself!"

"Another naga around this area? I doubt it, however explain yourself. So I can judge if what you say is true."

"Cautious, he wasn't brazen to attack when I claimed to not be the hypnotist naga. Normally my kind wouldn't be near the populated areas. And I wasn't far enough to claim I was simply hunting. However, if my reason can bring us back to the village...", she thought. "You see I am hunting the same prey as you are."

She heard the sound of metal cutting the air, the hunter wasn't convinced. This next choice of words had to sound better or else a confrontation was certain. "Let me finish. She is a rogue, and as I speak has been enslaving people to build a small army against my clan of naga.", revealing her plans to him seemed the best way to make the unlikely circumstance plausible. Her power would cause a race to fight back against a rouge element.

She heard the hunter's sword again and it sounded like...
1112.title: She manages to reason with whoever it is

choices: "Katheryn" is found by Kyle and Susan
11121.content:
"I was not aware that this naga was turning into a sizable threat or that your kind were hunting her yourselves.", the hunter replied. The naga smiled inside her facade of deceit. "I am incredible sorry that my trap hurt you, may I look at your wound?"

In any other time this would be the dumbest move to make on her, but with her handicap, it wouldn't hurt to have her eyes healed a bit faster, or to ensure no permanent damage was caused. The naga hypnotist lowered her hands from her face, revealing her still present and unrivaled beauty to the hunter. hen he saw the naga's face he was awestruck, as never before had he ever seen something so dazzling. The naga's entrancing beauty as formidable even with her hypnotic eyes removed. More often she used them without relying on her other attributes.

The hunter leaned close to her face and took out a cloth, putting some sort of potion on it. He rubbed it very delicately over her eyes. Desiring to break the ice, the naga asked for the hunter's name. "So tell me foolish hunter, who do I call the one who blinded me?"

"Asher. Just Asher. And you are?", he replied back.

In truth the naga had not spoken her name aloud in a very long time. Her slaves in the village never even knew it. They always called her by Mistress. It was what she heard from every interaction that wasn't governed by fear or resistance. She figured an alias would be safe, just in case. He was close to shoving a sword in her heart, naturally a sizable defense would be within her instinct. "Katheryn."

"Well Katheryn I am gravely guilty about attacking the wrong naga.", she heard him softly sniff the air. "Of course. My pheromones from before. Interesting? I never used it on humans. My eyes did all the swaying for me. Of course he won't bow to kiss my tail. But this could be used to get his attention later down the line if I need to. But for now...", she placed the arm she coated with her scent up to Asher's face.

The naga could feel his body warm up. Just from touch and smell, she had his attention other than the end of his weapon.

"Uh-hmm. The damage looks pretty bad."

"Nagas regenerate faster than humans."

"I know, I researched your race. But I mean is that the powder I used, its bacterial and is causing discharge. If I don't find anything to fix it, you may go blind permanently.

No time to loose then! He was willing to help! She had to let him get to the village now! Without her eyes, she could not enslave the hunters that would be on her doorstep and they would kill her! "Asher. There is a village nearby, they should have a medical inn that should house what you need to fix my eyes. Hurry!"

"Don't worry I'll be back soon. Do you have any idea where?"

"The village has a tall rock formation that hangs on the far end of it. I was going to see if the hypnotist enslaved them, before stepping into your trap while I hunted for food."

"Great. Stay there!", he left.

"Grrrrr. Hurry soon. The faster you run, the faster I will have you begging me to spare you from having your mind turned into a pile of mush."
11121.title: He holstered it

111212.content:
As Katheryn rested under a tree awaiting for Asher to return, she soon heard sounds of more than one person headed for her. She climbed up the trees hiding above, stalking them. Without any hesitation she used her long tail to snag the two unsuspecting travelers until she recognized them. "Mistress! It is us!"

"Kyle? Susan? My loyal slaves.", she lowered them down to the ground where her hypnotized servants noticed her condition.

"Mistress, why are your eyes covered?", Susan asked.

"A monster hunter set a trap, I'm blind for the time being until my eyes heal."

"Say the word, and he will suffer.", Kyle cried out.

"NO! We are in the middle of a delicate plan right now. If word gets out a hunter died, where we were leading a garrisons worth to, they will get wise and kill me. We need to take care of that hunter with a more alluring method."

"But without your eyes, how will he be under your spell?", Susan asked.

"My eyes are not the only source of hypnotism my dear. I spent years making myself into the most desirable Naga in the world. My eyes had always been the quickest way to anyone's mind and soul. But I have other methods. My natural pheromones for example. They're not strong but they can be helpful in setting the mood. My natural beauty is rivaled by none, even among other monster I've been called lovely beyond comparison. My seduction I use everyday. And lastly worthy of note are my lips. One kiss will have him choking on Naga venom in mere moments."

"Quite a repertoire mistress."

"I pride myself on them. Now on to more pressing matters, has the town's normal commands been activated?"

"Yes the town has forgotten, they're enslaved to you. This hunter won't suspect a thing.", Kyle replied.

"Good you carried my order, but in my condition and this hunter being formidable, I can't go back until my sight returns. Even worse we need a scapegoat for him to hunt, or else he will realize I'm his target.", the Naga slithered in place contemplating any plans she could to reverse this turn of events in her favor."

"Mistress, if you would allow us, we will hunt a Naga and bring back to you so you can persuade it to fill in the role.", Kyle suggested.

"Naga hypnotism is difficult to use on others of our species. But you have the right idea on hunting one. Susan, Kyle. Track down any Naga nearby and report your findings to me. And until I have my sight back, stay out of view from the city and especially from our fellow monster hunter.", the Naga ordered.

"As you wish, our lovely mistress.", the two slaves answered back.

"Get here soon Asher. My eyes need to be cleaned so I can bend your will like a piece of trash.", she swore.
111212.title: "Katheryn" is found by Kyle and Susan

1112121.content:
Some time later Asher returned with what he required to heal Katheryn's eyes. He called out to her alerting her of his presence. "Katheryn, I have the medicine. Lie down and open your eyes.", he told her in a very hasty manner. Not that she gave any reluctance. She did as he asked and let him do his work. Asher took the medicine and poured some on a clean rag, then placed it on top of Katheryn's eyes.

"Tffffffft! Hrrrrrgggghhhhh! It's burning!"

"That means its working. Bacteria you accumulated would have permanently scarred you. It'll pass by in a just a few minutes. Try not to shut your eyes too much."

She could have kept them open for an hour if she needed to, given her experience with hypnosis. She wanted to tauntingly reply with a snark comment about how superior she was, and praising her hypnotic methods. But the restraint she needed in order to survive tempered her tongue. "How long will it last?"

"Best guess about 2 maybe 3 days tops before your fully healed and can see again."

"You owe me for this when were finished tracking that Naga rogue.", she lied through her teeth.

"I can pick up the trail first thing tomorrow. You can come along to help if you think your up for it.", Asher offered.

"I'll sit back. I may be a naga but my eyes are still essential for me like most of you humans.", she replied. She could hunt without sight, but no need to tell him. Spying on him would be critical in order to plant the naga Katheryn would use to take her place until her sight came back. She pretended to fall asleep, lying sideways while Asher tended to start making a fire for the evening. Unbeknownst to him, the sneaky naga secreted off more of her pheromones making the camp site ripe with growing attraction for the serpentine seducer.

He was ignorant to the fact, believing his growing fondness stemmed naturally when it never occurred it was coerced by her. This was the first step, but she needed to have the second one finished and ready within the following day.

She rested silently with her final thoughts dwelling on how she would make Asher her most humiliated slave in her roster of enslaved hunters.
1112121.title: Asher returns

11121212.content:
As Asher was asleep, the hypnotic naga took advantage of his helplessness. While she said nothing, all manner of schemes and silent taunting occurred in his head. All she did was stare at her prey, slithering around him, wishing she could kill him. She had direct means of control, and it ate away at her ego like a rash that would not back down. But the naga was still one to make the best out her circumstances. "You think my pheromones got your attention before? You haven't seen nothing yet. So fall in deep sleep my little Asher, dream. Dream of me. Dream me as the object of affection. Don't just love me, become obsessed. Every night I will smoother you in my pheromones, until you will be too love struck that I won't worry about you alerting the hunters.", she said in her head looming over Asher.

She curled up her tail, leaking her liquid love scent on Asher while he rested. The drops were small, like drops from a leaf, nothing to wake him luckily for her. She had this smile, the kind you see when someone is enjoying every second of what is passing. The naga wished so badly to wrap him in her coils. Take his head, toward hers, blast his eyes full of hypnotic color until their optic nerves were so stimulated it fried their optic nerves and left them in complete catatonia. Not a quick death, a long dragged out experience.

"Oh my slaves can't get here any sooner. At least then, I could have them help me dispose of your body. Sleep well my 'darling' tomorrow you will fetch your hypnotic naga. Then I will reward you the greatest gift I will ever bestow on any mortal human. The feeling of my power overwhelming those senses. Every nerve and fiber, all clamoring for me. And as the body dies, it will still beg for me even after death, that is what love means to me. And all you will soon ever know. Keep resting, and think of me in every dream, vision, fragment wandering in your mind.", she chuckled and clucked while he fell asleep still. And Asher's nightly thoughts now, were all pointed at her. The flawless body, the exquisite features, the obsessive desire to be near her and loved was hovering in Asher's mind. Question was, could Asher see past it and through the naga's deception in time?
11121212.title: Later that night...

choices: Coil Asher (Oozing more pheromones in the process)
111212121.content:
When most people wake up, what's the first thing that pops in their head in the morning? As Asher woke up, the first thought on his mind, would be Katheryn. Asher turned his sights to wherever she was resting, sure enough she laid on the opposite end of the camp fire. Asher looked at her, intently, perhaps he was studying her to pick up a clue on hos Nagas were asleep or awake by their body movement. One might assume so given his actions. But here, he stared at her, longingly, for some reason his heart grew a little heavy, his face flushed. Asher watched her until she awoke.

"Mmmm. Morning.", the naga said.

"Morning.", Asher replied back sharply quick.

Asher noticed his excitable reaction, and went off to cook a meal. The deceptive half-serpent smiled noticing her pheromone dosage from last night had gotten his attention. While Asher was far enough away she heard her enslaved servants whisper out to her.

"Mistress. We are luring the naga to you, be prepared for a fight to occur.", Kyle informed his mistress.

This was good, another naga appearing could forcibly move their scuffle into the village. If Asher was seen helping her, then the townsfolk would have no need to fear her until she regained control. She went to join Asher, stall him to keep him near viewing distance of the village for all to see. She had a way to keep him occupied until the timing was right. What's a few charms from a gorgeous Naga if not distracting after all?

She went off to find Asher picking some apples off trees, when the Naga planned to....
111212121.title: Morning...

1112121212.content:
“Tell me Asher is there something wrong about me?”

“N-no. Hold on, how did you notice?”

“Last night, my vision showed significant improvement. Right now it is as if I am squinting all the time but a far cry from earlier. The medicine has done an exceptional job.”

“Oh good.”

The Naga couldn't take the risk of trying her hypnosis. Better to be safe until she is certain she can use it without issues. The Naga slithered near him, holding a sultry smile in her lips. Asher became nervous unknown to him the pheromones had provided his senses the illusion of romantic desire. He felt attraction for this half-serpent. Her proximity made him act less stern and cautious, and more of a young adolescent facing his crush. The Naga noticed his defenses lowering, she decided to turn up the heat.

"You know, it feels weird to be around someone for such a short time. And yet feel a strong connection so suddenly.", she said. Her words were giving his mind way to possibility.

"Does she feel the same? Will it work? Why am I thinking this now? She is so beautiful.", all of these thoughts ricocheted off his brain like a superball.

The naga had her tail move behind him, and gently nudged the hunter near her half human body. Asher's face grew red and his heart was not steady in the slightest. "Asher, I feel we have something you and I. Are you interested in me?", she asked knowing the answer already.

"Katheryn, you may just be the girl of my dreams."

"Oh Asher you charmer.", she said stroking her index finger under his chin. She was tempted, the moment seemed appropriate to adhere to a venomous kiss. But perhaps a regular one would work better in the long term. As she needed to remind herself, patience was essential. But the waiting was ripping her apart. She couldn't keep it up any longer.

But then she heard something....
1112121212.title: Psychologically tease and seduce Asher

choices: Awaken Kyle but leave him in the woods
Awaken Kyle and help him back to their village
'Test' The hypnotic power of the naga
It doesn't work and she leaves him
It doesn't work but she attempts to bring him back to the village
12.content:
As Susan picked up the head of the naga she looked into it's eyes and relaxed.
"Wow... it still... works" She quickly pulled herself away before more damage could be done and wrapped the head in some leather to protect herself and others from the gaze.
"This will look amazing on my wall, right next to my succubus head and dragon scales!" Susan was getting very exited but then remembered kyle was still entranced.
"Oh shit" She ran over to kyle and started slapping him as fast as she could.
"Wake up! Come on man wake up!" She was starting to worry now. Then Susan remembered that the naga had hypnotized him, so maybe it could awaken him from the trance.
"Kyle look into the eyes, and listen to me..."

What does Susan do?
12.title: The female warrior defeats the naga

choices: Nope she got back to her house with nothing going wrong
Another hypnotic naga had heard her... and now she wanted revenge
Ruby had heard her and planned on using the head on Susan ASAP.
121.content:
"... I want you to awaken from this trance in exactly 5 minutes. Do you understand?" Susan was praying that Kyle would respond and after brief silence kyle replied
"Yes Madame."
"It worked! Thank the gods. Right sorry Kyle but I have to get this back to my house before anything else goes wrong. Plus you are capable of taking care of yourself." With that Susan Started her journey back home, excited about how she would be able to rub this in her rival Rubys face.
"That red-head is going to be so jealous that I managed to slay a hypnotic naga before her! I can't wait to see the look on her face!"

But was anyone listening to Susans boasting?
121.title: Awaken Kyle but leave him in the woods

choices: Susan managed to hypnotise Ruby with the head
Ruby Managed to steal the head and hypnotised Susan
A hypnotic naga comes out of nowhere and hypnotises them both
1213.content:
Hidden in the trees, a redhead was listening in on Susan and she was getting angry
"That bitch! How was she able to slay a hypnotic naga! Them things are un-killable! Oh, when I get my hands on that head she will do all the dangerous work whilst I sit back, relax and take all the glory." With that Ruby started moving closer to Susan
Susan was still boasting to herself when Ruby pounced on her and went for the head.
"I have you now bitch!" Ruby shouted
"Get the fuck off me!" Susan shouted back.

They fought for a while but in the end...
1213.title: Ruby had heard her and planned on using the hea...

choices: Yes, she is safe in the village
Yes but another naga is hypnotizing the village
No and a new monster catches sight of her.
124.content:
"you will wake up when I snap my fingers. 1,2,3"*snap* Kyle was still in trance. Susan kept trying over and over but it just wasn't working.
"I am so sorry Kyle, I have to leave you. But I promise I'll send someone for you!" And with that, Susan started walking back to the village. She didn't want to leave him buy she had no choice. She had to get back before sunset otherwise more dangerous Monsters would either end her life or enslave her with their own hypnotic powers.

Did she get back before sunset?
124.title: It doesn't work and she leaves him

1243.content:
Susan could see that the sun was setting in the distance and she had run out of safe time.
"Oh shit. Right, lets hope that lady luck is on my side tonight." She had her hand at her sword ready to draw it if any dangers approached her. Little did she know that in the trees, a hypnotic creature of the night was waiting for the right moment to hypnotize Susan.
"Well well, what have we here." She said to herself. A late dinner perhaps or maybe a suitable mate. We will soon find out blondy, we shall soon find out.

What creature had found Susan?
1243.title: No and a new monster catches sight of her.

12431.content: Now was Susan lunch to her, or a mate?
12431.title: A succubus

choices: Gave up and looked into her eyes
Kept shielding her eyes in an attempt to resist
124312.content:
"Well she is pretty sexy in that warrior get up. But soon she will fall for me and become my loving little girlfriend. Soon you will be mine" She slowly but silently approached Susan and tapped her on the back. Susan turned around and was greeted by a beautiful sight. In front of her stood a girl with long black hair reaching her ass and obsidian eyes and lips to match. She had large breasts and was only wearing a corset to cover herself. She also had a large set of wings on her back and a tail with a small heart on the end. Susan drew her sword and covered her eyes.
"Succubus! Stay away from me if you want to live. I will not hesitate to struck you down where you stand."
The Succubus ignored the threat and instead started to seduce Susan.
"Come now sexy, you wouldn't strike little me down would you? After all, I can make you life much more interesting than the one you currently have." The succubus started rubbing Susan's body in an attempt to further seduce her. "All you have to do is drop your weapon and look into my eyes." The succubus's eyes then turned purple so that Susan would be instantly hypnotized as soon as she looked. Susan could feel the power of the succubus melting her mind and making her want to look. She then remembered that Kyle was still out there and started restraining herself. In the end Susan...
124312.title: A mate

1243121.content:
Despite Susan's struggle, the overwhelming power of the succubus' eyes proved too much for her. As now she felt completely enamored by the demonic vixen.
"There's a good girl. Look into my eyes, they show you pleasures beyond your wildest dreams. Let them engulf your mind, show you how desire for me."

Susan stared back letting the succubi's words infect her mind. She felt this new sensation, of sexual obsession for the succubus. Never before had she felt that for someone of the same sex, but now in this moment, it felt wonderful. She smiled seeing the succubus in a lens of total and flawless perfection. Her body grew hot for the succubus, all she wanted was to mate with her.

"You feel it don't you? The passion, the obsession. But I can't just give myself to you. You must earn my pleasure for me to give it. Come now, pleasure your new lover."

Susan walked to the succubus slowly inching her way up to her face, her hands latched to the succubi's shoulders pulling herself up. Susan opened her mouth a bit and locked lips with the succubus. The instant she did, Susan felt like the most erotic moment of her life was captured in her mind and held on for every second she joined lips with the monster. The succubus returned her kiss and pulled Susan's face in closer, both her hands holding her chin, and the demon aggressively returned the passion a thousand times over. Susan felt like it was the best kiss she would ever receive in her life.

The kiss lasted for a few more seconds until Susan was pulled away by the succubus. For a moment Susan felt her mouth dance with unspeakable pleasure, as if tasting the greatest wine on earth. "Very nice, I must say I'm impressed. But tell me? Do you know how long someone can withstand the pleasure a succubus grants to a human?"

Then Susan felt her throat burn, on fire, the back of her mouth closing behind her. She gagged letting out her screams, but all that exited were just her tongue and audible chokes. "Oh my. I hope that you can withstand it? It would be fatal if you weren't able to.", the succubus giggled.

Susan concentrated on her breathing and tried calming her body. She needed to not let the pleasure fry her body. She laid on the ground, positioning herself to where she could gain as much air as she could. She placed water over her neck to cool down her stimulated part of her body. She breathed slowly, or had a strong effort to try, praying she wouldn't die like this.
1243121.title: Gave up and looked into her eyes

12432.content: Now was Susan Dinner or a mate?
12432.title: A spider girl

12433.content: Now was Susan Dinner or a mate?
12433.title: A cat girl
